content:
I am a Masters student in CSE specializing in Cryptography. I'm doing my Masters thesis under Prof. Manoj Prabhakaran. I also work closely with Prof. Bernard Menezes in the areas of Cryptanalysis and Homomorphic Encryption. I am a Research Assistant in the ISRDC (Information Security Research and Development Center) where my work focuses on Blockchain and Distributed Ledger Technology. 
Here is my CV.

title: Anasuya Acharya
